{"id":1478853554,"question_id":3227,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734206279,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1478853554/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Missing and Repeated Values","memory":"26.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findMissingAndRepeatedValues(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int n = grid.size();\n        vector<int> visited(n*n+1, 0); //50*50+1\n        int first = 0;\n        long long sum = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {\n                if(visited[ grid[i][j] ] == 1) \n                    first = grid[i][j];\n                sum += grid[i][j];\n                visited[grid[i][j]] = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        long long second = (n*n)*(n*n+1)/2 - (sum-first);\n        return {first, (int)second};\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-missing-and-repeated-values","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
